title: Riot MMR system is built to keep you down
body:
9 out of 10 I get in Promos and my team will be feeders or the enemy team is scripters/Booster/Smurfs

System is rigged

replies.body: Yes, Riot knows who will underperform and overperform each game and puts the odds specifically against you for your placements.

Its not about underperform or overperform.  I just had 2 promo games (the first was given because this is the Nth time in promos) and both games had Boosters on the enemy team and both of my jungles wanted to play a solo farm game without helping any lanes or going for objectives.

im that lucky guy who only got smurfs/boosters/scripters in my promos. 

I have a 9/10 chance of getting carried every game because riot likes me.
